otherNames: Anti-Celestial Destiny, Against The Heaven's Destiny, From Mouselike To Godlike, 逆天仙命
synopsis: After 20 years of misery, Wu You thought he was going to live his life in a muddle until he found the failed half-immortal Shenyuzi in a garbage can on a stormy day. After which his fate was changed forever! Let’s see how a loser inherits an immortal body, has beauties as his companions, subdues demons, owns hundreds of billions of dollars, and starts down the path of a counterattack!
